seo.title: Jobseeker Company - Connecting People with Opportunities
seo.description: Our products are designed to empower businesses to find the right talent, and also help every individual to discover fulfilling career opportunities.

meta.name: Jobseeker Company
meta.description: Our products and services created not only to empower businesses to find the right talent, but also help every individual to discover fulfilling career opportunities.

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.description: Jobseeker Company was established in February 2022 with the goal of creating one reliable economic ecosystem for the workforce.

vacancy.title: We’re Hiring!
vacancy.description: Join us and be a part of a team that is passionate about making a difference in people's lives.

we-connect-text-line-1: Jobseeker Company, founded in February 2022, aims to connect people with various opportunities and create a reliable economic ecosystem. Our platform empowers individuals by linking them to opportunities matching their skills.
we-connect-text-line-2: We go beyond traditional employment, focusing on innovative solutions for compliance management. Our approach, driven by technology, collaboration, and empowerment, seeks to positively transform lives and contribute meaningfully to the economic landscape.
employment-population: Total employment to population ratio (% right hand axis)
our-first-market-text-1: Indonesia will be our first market with more than 75 million workforces who are junior high school graduates to diplomas.
our-first-market-text-2: The Indonesian Workforce Based on Education The total workforce in 2019 has reached 136.18 million people with 129.36 million working residents, both in the formal and informal sectors.
how-we-help-line-1: We help candidates in Indonesia find the best opportunities and maximize their potential with our social recruitment platform.
how-we-help-line-2: We assist companies, ranging from SMEs to large corporates, with technologies that provide them ease in human resource recruiting and upskilling.
how-we-help-app-desc: Jobseeker App is recruitment platform with social media format that simplifies the process for job seekers especially non-white-collar workers in Indonesia to get a job that suits their skills and experience in no time. It’s like a job dating app.
how-we-help-software-d-1: Hire high quality candidates from your own talent pool with a customized job portal powered by our Applicant Tracking System.
how-we-help-software-d-2: Monitoring performance, managing employees, developing employees through planned activities, analyzing and planning the workforce.
how-we-help-services-d-1: Augment your team with proficient professionals for specified durations and utilize our skilled talent for particular projects without making long term commitments.
how-we-help-services-d-2: Support your recruiting team in attracting talented individuals or managing large-scale recruitment to facilitate your business expansion in Indonesia.
how-we-help-services-d-3: We are experts in designing responsive websites for medium to complex projects and turning your ideas into dynamic mobile apps with advanced features
how-we-help-services-d-4: Maximize your company's success starting from the HR Division. Our expert team is ready to become your trusted HR partner, providing reliable consultation to overcome every HR challenge your company faces.
how-we-help-partners-desc: Jobseeker Partners Facilitates SMEs owner in Indonesia in finding the right employee to support their business growth.
about-us-line-1: Jobseeker Company was established in February 2022 with the goal of creating one reliable economic ecosystem for the workforce. Our recruitment platform aims to empower each individual by connecting them with opportunities that align with their skills and experience.
about-us-line-2: We want to enable them to improve their standard of living and achieve better prospects for their future.
adv-title1: Minister of Tourism and Creative Economy
adv-title3: Entrepreneur and Former Minister of Trade
adv-title8: Managing Director and Partner at Accenture
adv-title9: Vice President and General Manager (Asia Pasific Japan) Autofleet
career-desc-1: At Jobseeker Company, we believe that connecting people with opportunities can have a significant positive impact on their lives. Our dedication to this goal is reflected in our commitment to fostering creativity, promoting equality, supporting growth, and making a positive social impact through our work.
career-desc-2: Join us and be a part of a team that is passionate about making a difference in people's lives.
join-us: Join Us and Become a Part of Our Journey
trusted: Trusted by Giants in The Industry
trusted-detail: We take great pride in serving and delivering top-notch services to the leading companies in the industry.
inquiry-desc: Please fill out the form below to start
inquiry-success: Thank you for contacting us! We have received your inquiry and will get back to you as soon as possible.
tell: Tell us more about what you need?
modal-line-2: Apply, track the progress, and find out the next step by using Jobseeker App.
